section.name: Advanced sample
section.subsection:
The advanced sample application enhance the medium sample by using a messaging system. If a student finish the registration for an exam a message to a third party system will be sent.
This table gives an short description about the different use cases.
Registration confirmation After the student register for a selected exam, a confirmation will be also send to the exam administration system. The message is send to a defined topic queue.
Student notification In order to illustrate a asynchronous communication between two systems the exam administration system gives a feedback after all work is done for the registration
Add Student exam Add the registration for the student exam in the administration system
Check prerequisites In order to register for an exam a student must fullfill a set of prerequisits
Check Registration A student must be registered for the course, in order to do an exam
Check Payment Some courses and exams need extra payment. For this case an external ERP system must be contacted (e.g. via Web Service)
